lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby enters the faceoff circle with a plan every time, well aware it will almost certainly evaporate once the puck smacks the ice.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Edge Sharks 2-1, Take 2-0 Lead in Stanley Cup Final
